statements: SELECT * FROM media_literacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM media_literacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, organizer, target_audience FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE organizer = 'ABC Media';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM media_literacy_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, organizer, start_date FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE organizer = 'XYZ Media' AND budget > 10000;
SELECT * FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, organizer, target_audience FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 AND target_audience LIKE '%youth%';
SELECT * FROM MediaCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MediaCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MediaCampaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CampaignParticipants INNER JOIN MediaCampaigns ON CampaignParticipants.campaign_id = MediaCampaigns.campaign_id;

SELECT participant_id, participant_name, campaign_name FROM CampaignParticipants INNER JOIN MediaCampaigns ON CampaignParticipants.campaign_id = MediaCampaigns.campaign_id WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MediaCampaigns
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MediaCampaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM MediaCampaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, participant_name FROM MediaCampaigns INNER JOIN CampaignParticipants ON MediaCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignParticipants.campaign_id
SELECT participant_name, start_date, end_date FROM MediaCampaigns JOIN CampaignParticipants ON MediaCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignParticipants.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM media_literacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM media_literacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, measurement_date FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, join_date, campaign_name FROM campaign_participants INNER JOIN media_literacy_campaigns ON campaign_participants.campaign_id = media_literacy_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM media_literacy_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, campaign_name ASC;

SELECT participant_name, campaign_name FROM campaign_participants JOIN media_literacy_campaigns ON campaign_participants.campaign_id = media_literacy_campaigns.campaign_id WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM campaign_metrics WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM campaign_participants JOIN media_literacy_campaigns ON campaign_participants.campaign_id = media_literacy_campaigns.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_participants > 10;

SELECT campaign_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM campaign_metrics JOIN media_literacy_campaigns ON campaign_metrics.campaign_id = media_literacy_campaigns.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY avg_metric_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM media_literacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM media_literacy_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, join_date FROM campaign_participants WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM campaign_metrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Digital Literacy' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT participant_name, join_date FROM campaign_participants WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM campaign_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;

SELECT c.campaign_name, p.participant_name, m.metric_name, e.engagement_type FROM media_literacy_campaigns c, campaign_participants p, campaign_metrics m, campaign_engagement e WHERE c.campaign_id = p.campaign_id AND p.participant_id = e.participant_id AND e.engagement_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY e.engagement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM media_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT coverage_date, outlet_name FROM media_coverage WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM media_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM media_campaigns WHERE campaign_id > 10 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_events ce JOIN media_campaigns mc ON ce.campaign_id = mc.campaign_id WHERE mc.campaign_name = 'Summer Sale' AND ce.event_date > '2021-07-01';

SELECT cm.metric_name, cm.metric_description, mc.campaign_name FROM campaign_metrics cm JOIN media_campaigns mc JOIN campaign_events ce ON cm.metric_id = ce.event_id WHERE ce.event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT mo.outlet_name, mo.outlet_type, mc.campaign_name FROM media_outlets mo JOIN media_coverage mco ON mo.outlet_id = mco.outlet_id JOIN media_campaigns mc ON mco.campaign_id = mc.campaign_id WHERE mc.target_audience LIKE '%Youth%' ORDER BY mco.coverage_date DESC;
